Text: An Invitation to my NESA and Energy FriendsAn invitation to my NESA and Energy friends Intranets and Corporate Portals are on the rise in energy companies for two very simple reasons They help you save money They help you make money and in todays marketplace we all have to improve profitability and do more with less AGENCYCOM would like to assist with your eCommerce initiatives We are hosting a seminar Portals Beyond the Hype on Wednesday February th at our offices here in Houston Please pass this SAVE THE DATE notice to individuals within your organization who have an interest in using eCommerce to enhance workforce productivity market share customer satisfaction and employee loyalty I will send a formal invitation to your contacts next week if you will be good enough to send me their email addresses For your trouble AGENCYCOM will send your company a copy of a study we conducted which outlines the impact of portals from a users perspective and the benefits achieved Thank you for your time and action I appreciate your help Deborah ADDITIONAL INFORMATION IS ATTACHED Deborah L Meek AGENCYCOM Houston Woodway Suite East Houston TX v f wwwagencycom
